{
    "name": "Hayward metric",
    "abbrev": "haywardMetric",
    "description": "A spacetime metric that describes the geometry of a black hole with a de Sitter core, characterised by a singularity and an event horizon.",
    "defined": true,
    "derived": false,
    "signature": -1,
    "dimensions": 4,

    "charts": [
        {
            "chartName": "Spheroidal",
            "xlineElement": "(-1 + 2*m/(r*(r^2 + 9*m^2/(4*r))^(3/2)))\*ds^2 + (r^2 + 9*m^2/(4*r))\*dθ^2 + r^2*sin^2(θ)\*dφ^2",
            "validated": false
        }
    ],
    "desiredProperties": ["christoffels", "ricci", "riemann", "einstein", "weyl", "g00", "infiniteRedShift", "horizons", "singularities", "limits"],
    "diagrams": []
